com.esri.mo2.map.dpy
Class FeatureSelectionEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.dpy.FeatureSelectionEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FeatureSelectionEvent
extends EventObject

This event is sent to a FeatureSelectionListener whenever features are added or cleared from a feature layer.

See Also:
FeatureSelectionListener, Serialized Form
